thread.title: Great Hotel in London
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in London - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ice0105
title: Great Hotel in London
text:
Location: Good. 5 mins walk to Gloucester Road Tube Station
Room: Bedding is comfortable, clean, big and with a lovely kitchenette.
Price: average
Service: Staff is friendly and helpful. Reception open for 24 hrs and they provide free coffee/ cocoa for all guest.
Overall: Excellent, highly recommend.
